name: 24liveblog – live blog tool
author: 24liveblog

sections.description:
24liveblog is the most popular live blog tool. Over 70,000 publishers can’t be wrong. Join the largest real-time content platform today. Free to get started. It works with any type of website.
Website : https://www.24liveblog.com

  1. Real-time Live Blogging.
  2. Embed on Any Website
  3. Unlimited Events
  4. Unlimited Page Views
  5. Unlimited Concurrent Users
  6. Real-time Statistics
  7. Social Media Stream & Integration
  8. Audio/ Video Recording
  9. Navtive Mobile Apps
  10. Unlimited Event Contributor
  11. Group Chatting / Comments
  12. Draft & Schedule Posting
  13. Custom Template and Theme
  14. Spam Control Moderation
  15. Real Time Poll

Features

  1. Live Blog
    24liveblog is designed to be easy for both blogger and readers. A new way for real time contents delivery.

  2. Mobile Ready
    You can access the live contents from any device. You can download our mobile app from App Store and Google Play Store.

  3. Socila Media Integration
    Monitoring your twitter account and automated the posting process. Real-time twitter stream ready in the editor dashboard.

  4. Self-Adapted UI Look
    Adapts to your site’s look and feel, No custom CSS.

  5. Reliable and Powerful
    Cloud-base technology gives high-reliability. Help you handle the heavy traffic of breaking news.

  6. Easy to Install
    Easily integrates with any major type of website platform. It will only take minutes to add live blog to your website.

  7. Localiztion

    We support major languages to make your work localized.

  8. Social Media Sharing
    To share the real-time contents to other social platform easily.

Contact US

If you have any question, please feel free to contact http://www.24liveblog.com/contact
Email : 24@24liveblog.com
Twitter : http://twitter.com/24liveblog
Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/24liveblog
sections.installation:
Online installation:

  1. Please search “24liveblog” in wordpress.org and download the plugin.
  2. You need to create a 24liveblog account when you first sigh up.

Download installation:

  1. Please download the plugin via https://cdn.24liveblog.com/wp/24liveblog.zip and Upload the 24liveblog folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Log in the wordpress dashboard, install the plugin. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You need to create a 24liveblog account when you first sigh up.
sections.faq:
How to use : https://www.24liveblog.com/

1. Is 24liveblog free？

Yes, 24liveblog has the free forever plan to get started

2. Do you have customer support？

You can go to our website to get your help. https://www.24liveblog.com/contact

3. How long can you keep our data?

We won’t delete any user data. The data will be stored in our server forever.

2.0

  1. Mobile UI Optimizated
  2. Live Comments

  4. Performance Improvement

1.0
